items.sentence: I wasn\'t any quicker at doing that than Tom was.
I\'m sure I\'ll be able to do it sooner or later.
Tom says we can have all the apples on this tree.
Tom seemed to be having a good time at the party.
Tom seemed to be having trouble opening the door.
We haven\'t yet decided where we\'ll go tomorrow.
I don\'t think Tom will be in Boston next winter.
I don\'t want that kind of life for our children.
Don\'t tell me you\'re not going to Tom\'s party?
I often have to repeat things when I talk to Tom.
